Module BrickBreaker
Package breakout.core.screens

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.screens.Screen
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArenaScreen, EpilogueScreen, MenuScreen
public abstract class Screen extends Object implements DefaultDependenciesInjectable
The default implementation for all types of screen. Involves creating and handling the static view UI components.

  • Field Details

    • stage

      protected javafx.stage.Stage stage

    • scene

      protected javafx.scene.Scene scene

    • lastUpdate

      protected long lastUpdate
      The timestamp of the last frame update. This is used to calculate the time difference between frames for smooth animations and consistent game logic updates. It is measured in nanoseconds and obtained from the system's high-resolution time source.

    • delta

      protected double delta
      The time elapsed since the last update, expressed in seconds. This value is used to ensure frame-rate independent movement and animation. It is calculated by subtracting `lastUpdate` from the current frame's timestamp and converting the result from nanoseconds to seconds.

    • view

      protected View view

    • graphics

      protected javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics

    • loopCount

      protected int loopCount
